original_text: All day long the battle raged, and the king was propped up in his chariot facing the Arameans. The blood from his wound ran onto the floor of the chariot, and that evening he died.
korean_text: 이 날에 전쟁이 맹렬하였으므로 왕이 병거 가운데에 붙들려 서서 아람 사람을 막다가 저녁에 이르러 죽었는데 상처의 피가 흘러 병거 바닥에 고였더라

sentences.original_text: All day long the battle raged
and the king was propped up in his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 그의 전차에 기대어 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: The blood from his wound ran
onto the floor of the chariot
